00014 Component* TextRenderableCreator::createComponent(const string& name)
00015 {
00016     TextRenderable* ret = new TextRenderable(name);
00017     SceneManager::get()->registerRenderableListener(ret);
00018     return ret;
00019 }
00020 
00021 Component* TextRenderableCreator::copyComponent(const string& name, Component* com)
00022 {
00023     TextRenderable* renderable = static_cast<TextRenderable*>(com);
00024 
00025     TextRenderable* copy = new TextRenderable(name);
00026     copy->setFont(renderable->getFont());
00027     copy->setColor(renderable->getColor());
00028     copy->setBlendMode(renderable->getBlendMode());
00029     copy->setProportion(renderable->getProportion());
00030     copy->setTracking(renderable->getTracking());
00031     copy->setSpacing(renderable->getSpacing());
00032     copy->setText(renderable->getText());
00033     copy->setAlignment(renderable->getTextAlignment());
00034 
00035     SceneManager::get()->registerRenderableListener(copy);
00036 
00037     return copy;
00038 }
